request.description:
Performs a login.

To specify the URL, username and password, please use the collection variables `url`, `username` and `password`. You can find these when you edit the `Partner.Net Data API` Collection.
If the request succeeds, it will set the authentication token to a collection variable called `token`.

Performs a login.

To specify the URL, username and password, please use the collection variables `url`, `username` and `password`. You can find these when you edit the `Partner.Net Data API` Collection.
If the request succeeds, it will set the authentication token to a collection variable called `token`.
Returns all activities matching the query.
Returns all advisor types matching the query.
Returns all applications matching the query.
Returns all brands matching the query.
Returns all matching the query.
Returns all details of the company.
Returns all details of the company. You can add multiple ids to get more companies at once.
Returns all company group types matching the query.
Returns the details of the company group type. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all company number types matching the query.
Returns the details of the company number type. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all company types matching the query.
Returns the details of the company type. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all contract states matching the query.
Returns the details of the contract state. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all contract types matching the query.
Returns the details of the contract type. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all external brands matching the query.
Returns the details of the external brand. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all functions matching the query.
Returns the details of the functions
Returns the details of the function. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all number types matching the query.
Returns the details of the number type. You may use the mc parameter to get multiple details at once.
Returns all persons matching the query. The persons have to be affiliated with your application, thus you may not see any result with this sample.

Returns all persons with the specified id. You can add multiple ids to get more users at once. The persons have to be affiliated with your application, thus you may not see any result with this sample.

Returns all persons with the specified function. You can add multiple functions to get more users at once. The persons have to be affiliated with your application, thus you may not see any result with this sample.
Returns all details of a person. The person has to be affiliated with your application, thus you may not see any result with this sample.
Returns all details of a person. You can add multiple ids to get more users at once. The person hasto be affiliated with your application, thus you may not see any result with this sample.
